content: repeat last two row until there are 15 17 19 stitches between the markers on last row slip the gusset stitches onto a spare length of yarn remove markers co one st using backward loop method and continue working the cable pattern palm stitches now have one more stitch than back-of-hand stitches work even until cable pattern is finished if necessary continue working in st st until palm measures 3 5 4 4 5 inches long above the ribbing next round k18 19 21 sts put 8 10 10 st on spare yarn or stitch holder for pinky finger co 2 sts using backward loop method to cover gap and knit remaining sts knit these 39 41 45 sts for 3 rounds work index finger k7 7 8 place 24 26 28 st on spare yarn co 2 st using backward loop method to cover gap k8 8 9 k these 17 17 19 sts in the round until index finger measures 2 5 3 3 25 inches or desired length k2tog for one round ending k1 break yarn and thread tail through remaining stitches and fasten_off work middle finger place next 6 7 7 held st on needle join yarn and knit 6 7 7 co 2 sts using backward loop method place last 6 7 7 held sts on needle knit these sts and pick up two sts along base of co edge from index finger knit these 16 18 18 sts in round until middle finger measures 2 75 3 3 5 inches or desired length k2tog for one round break yarn and thread tail through remaining sts and fasten_off ©2009 susan iding for personal non-commercial use only p age | 3 work ring finger place remaining 12 12 14 sts on needle join yarn and knit these stitches and pick up two sts along base of co edge from middle finger knit these 14 14 16 sts in round until ring finger measures 2 5 2 75 3 inches or desired length k2tog for one round break yarn and thread tail through remaining stitches and fasten off work pinky finger place held 8 10 10 sts on needle join yarn and knit these sts and pick up two sts along base of co edge from ring finger knit these 10 12 12 sts in the round until pinky finger measures 1 75 2 2 5 inches or desired length k2tog for one round ending k1 break yarn and thread tail through remaining sts and fasten_off work thumb place held 15 17 19 sts on needle join yarn and knit these sts and pick up one stitch in base of co stitch in hand knit these 16 18 20 sts in the round until thumb measures 1 75 2 2 5 inches k2tog for one round break yarn and thread tail through remaining sts and fasten_off weave in all ends right glove co 44 48 52 sts arrange sts on 4 dpns 2 circular needles or one
